Title: Tape 4, Side A
Writer: Elizabeth Benjamin (teleplay by), Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Nic Sheff (story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Another student sabotages Hannah during a class project. Clay's nightmares about Hannah spill over into the daytime.
